issue.title: Change the SDF spec to make <plugin> less gazebo-specific

content.raw:
I'd like to go back to this.

What would it take to get the type and optional file parameter implemented ? I don't mind doing the work, but I'm not entirely sure about the way forward ...

How I see it, I would need to:
* propose a PR to sdformat to add the type attribute and make the filename attribute optional. This requires only to change the .sdf description (/usr/share/sdformat/... in the installed packages). The type attribute would be 'gazebo' by default.
* propose a PR to gazebo that would ignore plugin tags whose type is not `"gazebo"`.

Am I missing anything ?
